true_answer: Cherry blossoms, known as sakura in Japan, symbolize the beauty and transience of life. Image of a cherry blossom festival generated.

steps.content: Can you tell me about the significance of cherry blossoms and also generate an image of a cherry blossom festival?
Plan: 1) Search for the cultural and symbolic significance of cherry blossoms. 2) Generate an image of a cherry blossom festival. 3) Return the combined answer.
Searching for the cultural and symbolic significance of cherry blossoms.
Cherry blossoms, known as sakura in Japan, symbolize the beauty and transience of life. They are celebrated during cherry blossom festivals, marking the arrival of spring.
Generating an image of a cherry blossom festival.
Image of a cherry blossom festival generated.
